sentences.en: Ensure that new wood has been seasoned.
Ensure that the frame is securely fixed to the ground with bolts.
sentences.cn: 确保用螺栓把框架牢牢地固定在地面上。

sentences.en: Ensure that whatever you gain now will be for keeps.
sentences.cn: 确保你现在所获得的一切永远不会失去。

sentences.en: facilities to ensure the safety of cyclists
sentences.cn: 确保骑车人安全的设施

sentences.en: Goldsmith has repaired the roof to ensure the house is wind-proof.
sentences.cn: 戈德史密斯修理了屋顶，以确保房屋能够抗风。

sentences.en: I have a particular responsibility to ensure I make the right decision.
sentences.cn: 我肩负特殊责任，必须确保自己作出的决定是正确的。

sentences.en: Our role is to ensure liaison between schools and parents.
sentences.cn: 我们的作用是确保学校与家长间的联系。

sentences.en: procedures that must be followed to ensure full compliance with the law
sentences.cn: 为确保严格遵守法律所必须遵行的程序

sentences.en: Senior politicians connived to ensure that he was not released.
sentences.cn: 几位资深政治家串通起来确保他不会获释。

sentences.en: The drill should be slowly rotated to ensure a clean hole.
sentences.cn: 钻头必须缓慢转动，以保证钻孔平整光滑。

sentences.en: The hospital tries to ensure that people are seen quickly.
sentences.cn: 这家医院尽量确保人们可以迅速就诊。

sentences.en: These man-made barriers will ensure a very high degree of protection.
sentences.cn: 这些人造屏障将会确保提供高度的保护。

sentences.en: Use a black pen on white paper to ensure good reproduction.
sentences.cn: 用白纸黑笔，以确保复印清晰。

sentences.en: We do a blood count to ensure that all is well.
sentences.cn: 我们检查了血球指数，以确保一切正常。

sentences.en: We must constantly adapt and innovate to ensure success in a growing market.
sentences.cn: 我们必须不时地适应并创新，以确保在不断扩大的市场中取得成功。

sentences.en: We must ensure our children against contamination by bad ideas.
sentences.cn: 我们必须保护我们的儿童不受坏思想的侵蚀.

sentences.en: We will be going all out to ensure it doesn't happen again.
sentences.cn: 我们要全力保证此事不再发生。

trans.tran_en: to make certain that something will happen properly

trans.tran_cn: 保证， 担保， 确保
trans.tran_en: to make certain that something will happen properly
